metadata.title: CVE-2024-46700 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu/mes: fix mes ring buffer overflowwait memory room until enough before writing mes packetsto avoid ring buffer overflow.v2: squash in sched_hw_submission fix(cherry picked from commit 34e087e8920e635c62e2ed6a758b0cd27f836d13)

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
